Abrams "Luke Skywalker has vanis… ``` ::: ::: ::: ## Example 2: Naver news ::: r-fit-text - [네이버 뉴스](https://news.naver.com/) - 뉴스 검색: "지방소멸" - 검색 결과: ::: ## Example 2: Naver news ::: panel-tabset ## Code ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} url <- "https://search.naver.com/search.naver?where=news&ie=utf8&sm=nws_hty&query=%EC%A7%80%EB%B0%A9%EC%86%8C%EB%A9%B8" title <- url |> read_html() |> html_elements(".news_tit") |> html_text2() contents <- url |> read_html() |> html_elements(".dsc_txt_wrap") |> html_text2() tibble(title, contents) ``` ::: ## Result ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} url <- "https://search.naver.com/search.naver?where=news&ie=utf8&sm=nws_hty&query=%EC%A7%80%EB%B0%A9%EC%86%8C%EB%A9%B8" title <- url |> read_html() |> html_elements(".news_tit") |> html_text2() contents <- url |> read_html() |> html_elements(".dsc_txt_wrap") |> html_text2() tibble(title, contents) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 0 × 2 # ℹ 2 variables: title , contents ``` ::: ::: ::: # API `httr2` package ![](images/clipboard-2579380411.png){fig-align="center"} ## Example: Naver news ::: r-fit-text - NAVER Developer () - \[Products\]-\[서비스 API\]-\[검색\] () - 오픈 API 이용 신청 - 개발 가이드 보기 - 오픈 API 이용 신청 - 애플리케이션 이름 - 비로그인 오픈 API 서비스 환경 - WEB 설정 - 웹 서비스 URL: http://localhost ::: ## Example: Naver news ::: {.cell} ::: ::: panel-tabset ## Code 1 ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(httr2) search <- "지방소멸" your_url <- "https://openapi.naver.com/v1/search/news.json" result_naver <- request(your_url) |> req_headers( "X-Naver-Client-ID" = your_ClientID, "X-Naver-Client-Secret" = your_Client_Secret ) |> req_url_query( query = search, display = 100, start = 1, sort = "date" ) |> req_perform() |> resp_body_json() naver_data <- data.frame(t(sapply(result_naver$items, data.frame))) naver_data ``` ::: ## Result 1 ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(httr2) search <- "지방소멸" your_url <- "https://openapi.naver.com/v1/search/news.json" result_naver <- request(your_url) |> req_headers( "X-Naver-Client-ID" = your_ClientID, "X-Naver-Client-Secret" = your_Client_Secret ) |> req_url_query( query = search, display = 100, start = 1, sort = "date" ) |> req_perform() |> resp_body_json() naver_data <- data.frame(t(sapply(result_naver$items, data.frame))) naver_data ``` ::: {.cell-output
